title.value: Эффективность приминения гербицидов пульсар и тапир в семеноводческих посевах клевера ползучего
Efficiency of hybrids pulsar and tapyr application in white clover

journal.title: Agriculture and Plant Protection : scientific-practical journal

person.name: Dekhterevich, F.I., National Academy of Sciences, Minsk (Belarus). Grodno Regional Inst. of Plant Growing

abstract.value: In the conditions of the Republic of Belarus in 2011-2012 there were presented results of biennial studies on the biological effects of herbicides pulsar and tapir on seed sowing of white clover (Trifolium repens) when you apply them after sowing to germination or 1,2-leaf stage of crop. It was found that use of the herbicides in doses of 0,75-1,0 pulsar l/ ha allowed, on average for the years of research, reduce infestation of seed sowing clover on 78,0-96,0% and tapir – 81,7-94,3%. As a result of studied the herbicides puksar Sl, aqueuos solution, and tapir, aquatic concentrate in rates 0.75-1.0 liter/ha were allowed for application at seed coverless sowings of white clover in case of their pre-sowing application and at a stage of 1-2 real leaves. The presented herbicides proved to be efficient against annual dicotyledonous plants and grasses, as well as against some perennial dicotyledonous weeds.
